name: proxy-extend
description: Transparently extend a JS object with additional properties (using ES6 Proxy)
author: mkrause

scripts.build:cjs: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir lib-cjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build:esm: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir lib-esm --source-maps inline
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=cjs mocha --require @babel/register --recursive tests && tsd && echo '[tsd] success'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
